title: Episode 63 - Andre Gaines & Dr. Christian C. Gregory
itunes:title: Episode 63 - Andre Gaines & Dr. Christian C. Gregory
description: Filmmakers Andre Gaines and Dr. Christian C.Gregory break bread and discuss the making of 'The One and Only Dick Gregory' on Showtime. Amazing people and an amazing film!
